QuestData.Title: Alone in the Abyss
QuestData.Description: Champion, we will suffer the same fate as the Army of the Light if the Legion fires that infernal weapon upon us.$B$BWe must descend into the siege camp below and destroy it while we still can!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Grand Artificer Romuul to disembark the Vindicaar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Prophet Velen at Darkfall Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to Argus, homeworld of the Burning Legion.

Objectives.Objective: Velen and Illidan Run Off Seen
